item.title: LAM RESEARCH CORP 10-K
item.description: LAM RESEARCH CORP, which is in the Special Industry Machinery, Nec [3559] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 17, 2021 had 33127 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2021 - 391 instances june - 382 instances company - 372 instances 10 - 228 instances may - 210 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
